subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: Mercedes GP Petronas Formula One Team
lead_paragraph: Hamilton took the pole position for the Malaysian Grand Prix, while Mercedes’ run of nine straight front-row lockouts in Formula One came to an end as Ferrari’s Vettel qualified second.
snippet: Hamilton took the pole position for the Malaysian Grand Prix, while Mercedes’ run of nine straight front-row lockouts in Formula One came to an end as Ferrari’s Vettel qualified second.
